actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: Joint resolution to amend the joint resolution which codifies the rules and customs pertaining to the use and display of the U.S. flag to permit the display of the flag, if illuminated, at night.

summary.text: Permits the display of the flag, if illuminated, at night.

titles.title: Joint resolution to amend the joint resolution which codifies the rules and customs pertaining to the use and display of the U.S. flag to permit the display of the flag, if illuminated, at night.
